bug.author: lagagne72
bug.description:
Hello, I've tried this interesting script on my mac. It seems to generate a slowmo without any issues (slowly, but no errors), however the end result is full of artefacts like so: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5046739/52183550-1abe3300-2809-11e9-9d37-16b029d8a87b.gif></denchmark-link>
I've tried with several videos and always got these blinking colors. Any ideas what I should try next? Thanks!

comments.comment: Hello,guys,I encountered this problom too. Has anybody solved this problem yet? this is my temp file below <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25521522/52910902-29145080-32d9-11e9-9967-3f9710c7f483.png></denchmark-link>

Other users have also reported similar artifacts and I tried a temporary fix for CPU. I think for now you have to use the pretrained model as specified in the README or try training it from scratch on your device.
